tool_description: Retrieves complete permit history for a property including building permits, occupancy certificates, special use permits, and variances with their current status.

date_range_start.description: Start date for permit search range

date_range_end.description: End date for permit search range

error_messages: Property not found: No permits found for the specified property identifier.
Invalid date range: Start date must be before end date, and dates must be in valid format.
Permit type not recognized: One or more specified permit types are not valid categories.
Database access error: Unable to access permit database at this time.
usage: Provide property_id and optionally filter by permit_types, date ranges, or expired status. Critical for understanding authorized uses and modifications.

active_permits.description: List of currently active permit numbers

special_permits.description: Special use permits, variances, or exceptions

latest_occupancy_date.description: Date of most recent occupancy certificate
